blocks.name: cnbn
blocks.content: The set of complex numbers is a complex Banach space. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 4-Jan-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnbn(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, ccbn)
  -| wceq(c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(c0, ccbn), wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(cfv(cims, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)), cfv(ccmet, cc)))
  cnnv(c0)
  cncmet(cfv(cims, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)))
  eqcomi(cfv(cims, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)), ccom(cabs, cmin))
  cnims(ccom(cabs, cmin), cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  eqid(cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
  eqid(ccom(cabs, cmin))
  iscbn(c0, cfv(cims, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)), cc)
  cnnvba(c0)
  eqcomi(cfv(cims, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs)), cfv(cims, c0))
  fveq2i(cims, c0, cop(cop(caddc, cmul), cabs))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnbn(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈ CBan
  ⊣ c0 = < < +, × >, abs >
} = {
  mpbir2an(c0 ∈ CBan, c0 ∈ NrmCVec, (IndMet ` < < +, × >, abs >)∈(CMet ` ℂ))
  cnnv(c0)
  cncmet((IndMet ` < < +, × >, abs >))
  eqcomi((IndMet ` < < +, × >, abs >), (abs ∘ -))
  cnims((abs ∘ -), < < +, × >, abs >)
  eqid(< < +, × >, abs >)
  eqid((abs ∘ -))
  iscbn(c0, (IndMet ` < < +, × >, abs >), cc)
  cnnvba(c0)
  eqcomi((IndMet ` < < +, × >, abs >), (IndMet ` c0))
  fveq2i(cims, c0, < < +, × >, abs >)
}
